title: Living With Long Covid
content:
Long COVID as a disability
Research shows that people who develop Long COVID may experience new or ongoing symptoms that can significantly affect their daily activities. These symptoms can cause health complications that can even result in a disability.
Resources are available
.
Did you know?
Long COVID is a recognized condition that may result in a disability under the
Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA)
.
